All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
The main class of the Scheduler application.
ButtonEvent
This class represents an event that is fired when a button is pressed.
ButtonEventListener
This interface represents a listener for button events.
Controller
This class represents the controller for the MVC pattern.
DataManipulation
This is a tools class that contains methods to manipulate the data of the application.
DataTable
This class represents the data table of the application.
DayData
This class represents the data for a single day in a week.
DurationAdapter
This is helper class to serialize and deserialize Duration objects.
EditPersonWindow
This class represents the edit person window.
EditPersonWindowClosedListener
This class represents an update event.
FileEvent
This class represents an event that is fired when a file is opened or saved.
FontWidth
This is helper class that determines the width of the font for table cells.
LocalTimeAdapter
This is helper class to serialize and deserialize LocalTime objects.
MainPanel
This class represents the main panel of the application.
Model
This class represents the model of the application.
Person
This class represents the data for a single person.
ScheduleTable
 
ToolBar
This class represents the toolbar of the application.
UpdateEvent
This class represents an update event.
UpdateEventListener
This interface represents a listener for update events.
View
This class represents the view of the application.
WindowFrame
This class represents the window frame of the application.
